Why people love FeedbackLabs

It’s never been easier to gather and use your stakeholders’ input to improve the areas of your business that require it.

Ease of use

Intended for all skill levels — no software download, HTML skills, or design needed. Set up your first channel in minutes and get feedback instantly.

Customizaton & Brand

Customize your surveys with your own brand colors, logos, buttons, and more. You can even connect your own branded domain to send your surveys from.

Privacy

Protecting your data is our top priority. With encryption, SSO, SSAE-16 SOC II compliant data centers, and our commitment to GDPR compliance, your data is always safe.

Versatility

Get feedback on anything: products, purchases, churn and conversion rates, customer experiences, employee satisfaction, and much more.

Integrations

Do more with your feedback — no matter where you work. Connect FeedbackLabs with your favorite apps and web services using Zapier.

Fair pricing

We have pricing for businesses of all sizes to fit your organization's unique needs. Start on a free plan and upgrade as you grow. No credit card required and no need to talk to sales.

Use Channels to gather valuable feedback

Feedback channels are designed for gathering insights over longer periods of time, but they can also be used for one-time projects. Segment your stakeholders and target them at just the right time, schedule periodic invitations to ask for feedback, monitor keywords, and much more!

See How It Works

Pick the right feedback type for your situation

With FeedbackLabs, you can create many types of surveys and get the answers you need to make better decisions. Build better relationships and drive results for your business by learning more about (and from) your leads, customers, team members, partners, and other stakeholders.

Share insights and take action with your team

Help the right people affect change in your business by sharing valuable, timely insights about critical functions of your organization. Assign team members to handle time-sensitive feedback promptly. Track changes over time to recognize trends and measure performance.
